channel.title: A little Stumped here
channel.description:
Ok guys, Does anyone know how I can add fishing spots? I really have no clue how its done. I have a 317 [Delta-Based] server if that helps any.
Any and all help is apreciated
-Thanks Zukyak
(Happy Holidays)

item.title: A little Stumped here
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

Maybe When you get home or near a computer we can futher discuss this.
As for everyone else, this is still unsloved. As I said before Any and all help would be highly apreciated.

-Thanks
Zukyak

Read full topic

item.title: A little Stumped here
item.dc:creator: @theyungbubba theyungbubba
item.description:
@theyungbubba wrote:

1st Way
well just make a thing so where when you click on this fish spot(NPC) it(he) will give you item(390) and add xp(##, 1000) to your fish skill… Idk code… I’m only on iPod ATM

2nd Way

Npc??? Haha well maybe you could just use or find an object… And make a case

for example:
case ###:
{
sendmessage (“You’ve seem to of caught a fish1”)
addxp (##, 1200) //since I am not at my house on my //computer(I’m on iPod lol) I don’t know fish skill #…
additem (390, 1)
}
t’s not exact code… And you would still have to add global object…

But this would be quickest and easiest way… For now

Read full topic

item.title: A little Stumped here
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Zukyak, post:3, topic:321372”]So I would have to spawn a fishing spot?
Would there be anyway for me to tell what your fish out of them?[/quote]

Look at an NPC list such as the one in the MoparScape client.
